recipe_card: Bacon, Egg, and Cheese Buttermilk Biscuit Breakfast Sandwich
recipe_name: Bacon, Egg, and Cheese Buttermilk Biscuit Breakfast Sandwich
recipe_ingredients: [{"recipe_ingredients":"2 cups all-purpose flour"},{"recipe_ingredients":"2 teaspoons baking powder"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 teaspoon salt"},{"recipe_ingredients":"½ teaspoon baking soda"},{"recipe_ingredients":"⅓ cup shortening (such as Crisco®)"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 cup buttermilk"},{"recipe_ingredients":"2 tablespoons buttermilk"},{"recipe_ingredients":"6 slices bacon, cut in half"},{"recipe_ingredients":"4  eggs"},{"recipe_ingredients":"2 tablespoons water"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 tablespoon butter"},{"recipe_ingredients":"½ cup shredded Cheddar cheese"},{"recipe_ingredients":"salt and ground black pepper to taste"}]
recipe_directions: [{"recipe_directions":"Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."},{"recipe_directions":"Whisk flour, baking powder, salt, and baking soda together in a large bowl. Cut in shortening until mixture resembles coarse crumbs, 3 to 4 minutes. Make a well in the center of the flour mixture, pour in 1 cup buttermilk, and stir just until combined."},{"recipe_directions":"Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface. Pat and roll into a rectangle about 1/2 inch thick. Use a 3-inch biscuit cutter to cut out 6 biscuits. Transfer to the prepared baking sheet and brush the top of each biscuit with remaining buttermilk."},{"recipe_directions":"Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 10 to 12 minutes. Transfer biscuits to a wire rack to cool."},{"recipe_directions":"Meanwhile, place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. Drain bacon slices on paper towels."},{"recipe_directions":"Combine eggs and water in a bowl and whisk vigorously until smooth; set aside. Melt butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium-low heat. Swirl skillet to coat with butter; heat until just barely bubbling. Pour eggs into the center of the skillet, so butter gets pushed out to the sides."},{"recipe_directions":"Cook until edges of the eggs barely start to set. Gently scramble all the way around the pan using a spatula, creating large, soft curds. Sprinkle cheese onto the eggs at this point. Continue cooking, pausing in between to allow time for the cheese to melt and eggs to firm, gently pushing and folding the eggs to form large curds, about 3 minutes total. Do not allow the eggs to cook completely or eggs will turn chewy and rubbery. Remove from heat."},{"recipe_directions":"Slice biscuits in half and top bottom halves with scrambled eggs. Season with salt and pepper. Add 2 bacon pieces per biscuit, and finish with the biscuit tops. Serve immediately."}]

recipe_ingredients: [{"recipe_ingredients":"2 tablespoons olive oil"},{"recipe_ingredients":"6 spears fresh asparagus, trimmed and chopped"},{"recipe_ingredients":"½  red bell pepper, chopped"},{"recipe_ingredients":"½ cup cherry tomatoes, halved"},{"recipe_ingredients":"½ cup chopped fresh spinach"},{"recipe_ingredients":"½ teaspoon minced garlic"},{"recipe_ingredients":"½ teaspoon dried oregano"},{"recipe_ingredients":"½ teaspoon dried basil"},{"recipe_ingredients":"salt to taste"},{"recipe_ingredients":"2 tablespoons butter"},{"recipe_ingredients":"6  large eggs"},{"recipe_ingredients":"¼ cup whole milk"},{"recipe_ingredients":"½ cup crumbled feta cheese"},{"recipe_ingredients":"¼ cup shredded Cheddar cheese"}]
recipe_directions: [{"recipe_directions":"Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir asparagus and red bell pepper until the vegetables start to soften, about 3 minutes. Stir in cherry tomatoes, spinach, garlic, oregano, basil, and salt and continue cooking until tomatoes are soft and spinach has cooked down, another 3 to 5 minutes. Remove from heat and transfer vegetables to a plate."},{"recipe_directions":"Melt butter in clean skillet over medium heat. Whisk eggs and milk in a bowl and pour into hot butter, swirling skillet to cover entire bottom with egg mixture. Pull up an edge of the omelet with a spatula and tilt pan to allow unset egg to run underneath and cook; continue around pan, lifting omelet edge and tilting pan, until all the egg mixture is set. Sprinkle omelet with salt."},{"recipe_directions":"Spoon cooked asparagus mixture onto one side of the omelet and sprinkle with feta and Cheddar cheeses. Gently fold half the omelet over the vegetables and cheese and press edges lightly to seal in the filling. Cook until filling is hot and Cheddar cheese has melted, 1 to 2 more minutes. Cut in slices to serve."}]

recipe_card: My Big Fat Greek Omelet 51 Ratings
recipe_ingredients: [{"recipe_ingredients":"1 cup halved grape tomatoes"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 teaspoon dried oregano, divided"},{"recipe_ingredients":"½ teaspoon salt, divided"},{"recipe_ingredients":"Black pepper, to taste"},{"recipe_ingredients":"½ cup crumbled feta cheese (can use reduced-fat)"},{"recipe_ingredients":"8  large eggs"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 (10 ounce) package chopped frozen spinach, thawed and squeezed dry"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 tablespoon olive oil"}]
recipe_directions: [{"recipe_directions":"Heat a 12-inch non-stick skillet over low heat. (Use a 10-inch skillet if you halve the recipe to serve 2 instead of 4.) Meanwhile, in a small bowl, mix tomatoes, 1/2 tsp. oregano, 1/4 tsp. salt, and pepper to taste. Stir in feta."},{"recipe_directions":"In a medium bowl, whisk eggs together, then stir in spinach, 1/2 tsp. oregano, 1/4 tsp. salt, and pepper to taste. A few minutes before cooking omelet, add oil to the pan, and increase heat to medium-high. Heat until wisps of smoke start to rise from the pan. Add the egg mixture to the skillet. Using a plastic or wooden spatula to push back the eggs that have set, tilt the pan and let the uncooked egg mixture run onto the empty portion of the pan. Continue pushing back cooked eggs, tilting the pan and letting uncooked egg mixture flow onto the empty portion of the pan until omelet is moist but fully cooked, about 3 minutes. Reduce heat to low; pour the tomato mixture over half of the omelet. Using a slotted, flat spatula or turner, carefully fold the untopped half over the filling. Use the turner to slide the omelet onto a cutting board. Let stand a minute or two for the filling to warm."},{"recipe_directions":"Cut the omelet into 4 wedges and serve immediately."}]

recipe_card: Western Omelet 1 Rating

Add remaining 1 teaspoon butter; heat until foaming. Pour in eggs and cook for 30 seconds. Lift the edges of the omelet so that the uncooked egg runs under the cooked edges and comes into contact with the hot skillet. Shake and tilt the skillet to move the uncooked egg. Repeat until the top is set but still moist and soft, about 2 minutes."},{"recipe_directions":"Spread the filling over one side of the omelet. Fold the other half over the filling and slide omelet onto a plate."}]

recipe_ingredients: [{"recipe_ingredients":"1 pound sliced fresh mushrooms"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 tablespoon vegetable oil"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 quart half-and-half"},{"recipe_ingredients":"12  eggs"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 teaspoon salt and several grinds of pepper"},{"recipe_ingredients":"12 slices fluffy white bread"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 pound cubed fully cooked ham"},{"recipe_ingredients":"12 ounces extra-sharp cheddar cheese, grated"},{"recipe_ingredients":"½ cup thinly sliced scallions"}]

recipe_ingredients: [{"recipe_ingredients":"1 tablespoon bacon grease"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 (1 pound) loaf day-old bread, cubed"},{"recipe_ingredients":"12 large eggs"},{"recipe_ingredients":"2 teaspoons kosher salt"},{"recipe_ingredients":"½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 pinch cayenne pepper"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 pinch freshly grated nutmeg"},{"recipe_ingredients":"2 ½ cups heavy cream"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 pound sliced bacon, cut crosswise into 1/2-inch strips"},{"recipe_ingredients":"1 pound fresh spinach, wilted, squeezed dry"},{"recipe_ingredients":"12 ounces shredded extra-sharp Cheddar cheese, divided"}]
recipe_directions: [{"recipe_directions":"Oil bottom and sides of a 9x13-inch baking dish with about a tablespoon of bacon fat."},{"recipe_directions":"Place bread cubes in a large mixing bowl."},{"recipe_directions":"Crack eggs into a separate mixing bowl.
